review_text: Please, someone tell me what did I not get it right to have this grainy ice cream that stuck to the freeze bowl?It tastes more like a sorbet with all the ingredients I put guided by its manual.And, I am so surprised how much fat and sugar it requires to make an ice cream. Does anyone know how to make a healthy smooth ice cream recipe with low fat or non-fat options?
summary: good for sobet, not for an ice cream
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
